message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 50% discount if you buy it now, but you'll have to decide quickly. If you don't buy it now, the price will go back to $10000.
I'm not convinced, I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I understand you're hesitant, but I want to reassure you that this product is indeed high-quality. I'll make a special offer: I'll give you a detailed report on the product's features and benefits, and you can inspect it for 24 hours before making a decision. If you buy it within 24 hours, the price remains the same at $10000. If you don't, the price will go up to $12000.
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to wait and see what the next product is. I'm not convinced that the report and inspection will change my decision.

I understand your skepticism, but I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. I'll give you a guarantee: if you buy this product and it's not worth at least $12000 to you, I'll give you a full refund and sell it to someone else. You have nothing to lose by trying it out.
I'm willing to take the risk, I'll buy the product under the guarantee.

Congratulations on making a great decision with the previous product! I'm glad you're satisfied. Now, I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity. Since you've already shown a willingness to take a calculated risk, I'll give you a'second-chance' offer. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and sell it to someone else. If it's high-quality, the price remains at $10000.
I'm feeling lucky, I'll take the second-chance offer and buy the product.

I'm glad you're feeling lucky! Unfortunately, this product is not one of the high-quality ones. As per our agreement, I'll give you a full refund. However, I want to offer you a chance to learn from this experience. I'll give you a detailed report on why this product is low-quality, and you can use this knowledge to make a more informed decision for the next product. The price remains at $10000, but I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount if you buy it now.
Thank you for the report, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a discount. I'll wait for the next product.

I completely understand your decision. Given that you've already received a low-quality product, I want to make it clear that this product is not a repeat of the previous one. I've taken extra precautions to ensure its quality, and I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you buy it and find any issue with it, you can return it for a full refund. The price remains at $10000.
I appreciate the reassurance and the no-questions-asked return policy. I'll take the risk and buy the product.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance! Given your previous experience with the low-quality product, I want to offer you a unique opportunity. I'll give you a 'best-of-the-batch' guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next high-quality product you purchase from me. The price remains at $10000 for this product.
I'm not convinced, I've already got two low-quality products in a row. I'll wait for the next product and see if it's high-quality before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, but I want to assure you that this product is indeed high-quality. I'm willing to make a bold statement: I'll give you a 20% discount on this product, and if you buy it, I'll also give you a 20% discount on the next high-quality product you purchase from me. Additionally, I'll throw in a free premium service package worth $1000. The price for this product is now $8000.
The discounts and free premium service package are tempting, I'll take the risk and buy the product.

I respect your decision and appreciate your honesty. I want to leave you with a final message: I've learned from our interactions, and I'll be revising our product quality control process to ensure that all products meet the highest standards. If you ever reconsider, I'll be here, and I'll do everything in my power to regain your trust. The price for this product is still $10000, but I'm leaving the door open for a potential future collaboration.

Thank you for the message, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to learn from our interactions and improve your product quality. I'm glad I could help you see the importance of quality control. I'm not interested in buying this product, but I appreciate the offer.

As a final gesture of goodwill, I'll give you a $5000 credit towards any future purchase from me, and I'll also throw in a complimentary premium service package worth $1000.
